rules_text:
Whenever this creature or another creature you control enters, you gain 1 life and create an Aether token. [i](It's an enchantment with “Sacrifice two Aether: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
Flow – {7}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Draw three cards. [i](Each creature you tap while activating this pays for {1}.)[/i]
